attributes.action: Urge other world leaders to help stop the violence and brutality on the people of Zimbabwe by Robert Mugabes regime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent wave of political violence in Zimbabwe  has been devastating, with over 200,000 people internally displaced, 86 opposition supporters killed, 10,000 people injured, and 500 women and girls raped or assaulted. What is happening to people in Zimbabwe today is a gross violation of basic human rights and demands the world's attention and action.

rejection.details: There are other similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=zimbabwe&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=quango&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
